name: Nudge
description: Collaborated with a team of five to develop Nudge, a motivational workout app that is personalized to users. Promotes staying active and reduces a sedentary lifestyle using data from a smart watch. Designed the introduction and community page for Nudgeâ€™s mobile app  as well as the smart watch display using Figma.
